      Save a ticket, used to redeem tickets or add tickets to the system

      Sample Params:
      deviceId=thangle-device&gameType=BOOPY&ticketObjectType =PROFILE&purchaseCode =myboopytestsubscription3&receiptToken=XXXXXXXXXXX &purchaseProvider=GOOGLE

      Things to keep in mind:
      1) When passing in a receipt token, a purchase provider is required!

      2) You can now purchase an item using the ticketObjectType/purchaseCode params or the ticketObjectType/objectId params.
      Either way you need to always send in the ticketObjectType, and either the purchaseCode or the objectId.

      3) Difference between receiptToken and receiptData:
      receiptToken is a unique identifier that can be use to quickly determine whether a purchase has already been processed or not.
      SirqulResponse updateTicketWithFileUpload(Long accountId, String appKey, Enums.TicketActionType actionType, Enums.TicketObjectType ticketObjectType, Long objectId, String purchaseCode, String receiptToken, String receiptDataFilePath, Enums.PurchaseType purchaseProvider, List<Enums.PurchaseType> purchaseTypes, Boolean returnProfileResponse, Boolean includeProfileResponse, AppVersion appVersion)
      Update ticket with file upload.

      • getPurchaseList

        public PurchaseItemListResponse getPurchaseList(Long accountId,
                                       String appKey,
                                       List<Enums.PurchaseType> purchaseTypes,
                                       List<Enums.ServiceAction> serviceActions)
                                         throws SirqulException
        Get a list of purchasable items from the system. This is list if filtered by the game type and the purchase type list.

        Target API Endpoint: /purchase/list
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        purchaseTypes - a list of Enums.PurchaseType
        serviceActions - a list of Enums.ServiceAction
        Returns:
        a PurchaseItemListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

        Target API Endpoint: /ticket/ticketOffers

      • updateTicket

        public SirqulResponse updateTicket(Long accountId,
                          String appKey,
                          Enums.TicketActionType actionType,
                          Enums.TicketObjectType ticketObjectType,
                          Long objectId,
                          String purchaseCode,
                          String receiptToken,
                          String receiptData,
                          Enums.PurchaseType purchaseProvider,
                          List<Enums.PurchaseType> purchaseTypes,
                          Boolean returnProfileResponse,
                          Boolean includeProfileResponse,
                          AppVersion appVersion)
                            throws SirqulException
        Save a ticket, used to redeem tickets or add tickets to the system

        Sample Params:
        deviceId=thangle-device&gameType=BOOPY&ticketObjectType =PROFILE&purchaseCode =myboopytestsubscription3&receiptToken=XXXXXXXXXXX &purchaseProvider=GOOGLE

        Things to keep in mind:
        1) When passing in a receipt token, a purchase provider is required!

        2) You can now purchase an item using the ticketObjectType/purchaseCode params or the ticketObjectType/objectId params.
        Either way you need to always send in the ticketObjectType, and either the purchaseCode or the objectId.

        3) Difference between receiptToken and receiptData:
        receiptToken is a unique identifier that can be use to quickly determine whether a purchase has already been processed or not.
        receiptData is a blob of text that is necessary for validating a purchase via iTunes/Gooogle/etc.
        For example, a receiptToken might be a transaction id, while the receiptData might be a Json object containing a signature, purchase-info, etc.

        Target API Endpoint: /ticket/save

        Returns type AppResponse if returnProfileResponse is false, returns type ProfileResponse if true.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        appKey - the application key for what's currently being played. Maps to "gameType".
        actionType - the action being performed. Enums.TicketActionType
        ticketObjectType - the type of object being purchased. Enums.TicketObjectType
        objectId - the ID of the item being purchased.
        purchaseCode - the purchase code
        receiptToken - the receipt token
        receiptData - the receipt data
        purchaseProvider - the purchase provider
        purchaseTypes - a list of purchase types Enums.PurchaseType
        returnProfileResponse - the return profile response
        includeProfileResponse - the include profile response
        appVersion - the version of the application. AppVersion
        Returns:
        Returns type AppResponse if returnProfileResponse is false, returns type ProfileResponse if true.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateTicketWithFileUpload

        public SirqulResponse updateTicketWithFileUpload(Long accountId,
                                        String appKey,
                                        Enums.TicketActionType actionType,
                                        Enums.TicketObjectType ticketObjectType,
                                        Long objectId,
                                        String purchaseCode,
                                        String receiptToken,
                                        String receiptDataFilePath,
                                        Enums.PurchaseType purchaseProvider,
                                        List<Enums.PurchaseType> purchaseTypes,
                                        Boolean returnProfileResponse,
                                        Boolean includeProfileResponse,
                                        AppVersion appVersion)
                                          throws SirqulException
        Update ticket with file upload. Similar to updateTicket, but takes a file path for receiptData to upload. If no file is supplied, this will revert to updateTicket with a null receiptData. Returns type AppResponse if returnProfileResponse is false, else returns type ProfileResponse if true.

        Target API Endpoint: /ticket/save/fileUpload or /ticket/save if no file, or error reading file.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        actionType - the action type
        ticketObjectType - the ticket object type
        objectId - the object id
        purchaseCode - the purchase code
        receiptToken - the receipt token
        receiptDataFilePath - the receipt data file path
        purchaseProvider - the purchase provider
        purchaseTypes - the purchase types
        returnProfileResponse - If true, type ProfileResponse is returned, else type AppResponse is returned.
        includeProfileResponse - If returnProfileResponse is equal to false and you're expecting a AppResponse in return, setting this to true will include ProfileResponse within the returned AppResponse object.
        appVersion - the application version, AppVersion
        Returns:
        If returnProfileResponse is equal to true, than a ProfileResponse type is returned on valid request. If returnProfileResponse is equal to false, than a AppResponse type is returned on valid request. A SirqulResponse type is returned on invalid request, with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
